Articles.Content: I feel like all the hype threads finally merged. I don't see the countdown thread anymore. MOAR BOOSTERS!

> 
> We're loosing steam here! More hype coal is needed NAOW

\*Blasts dragonfire into firebox\*

Can't stop now!
![contact_kerbal.png](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/contact/contact_kerbal.png) I'm ready!

Wait for meeeee !

\*jumps on the hypetrain\*
need more hype

Recorded this morning in front of the KSC office!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/xn1W9aSpC7M?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Replies: 3,180

Views: 136,982

> 
> [http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/523/877/7b7](http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/523/877/7b7)
> All aboard, power at 9000!

Geeze, that thing is going to be a massacre if it crashes, or hits a hard bump.

No...please...have mercy ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I will be driving home (~3 hour trip) and if KSP gets released on my way there...well...I think speeding ticket will be imminent ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I just come onto the forums, browse off topic, everything's peaceful. Then I looked at the general KSP discussion forum viewer count.
Hype for 1.0. We need 400 pages.
MOARRR HYPE! We're setting the atmosphere on fire

> 
> Hype for 1.0. We need 400 pages.

Don't worry, as soon as we near 400 pages (at about 360 i estimate) we'll be accelerating again
I can imagine that the people at squad waking up to a peaceful morning, birds chirping, great day for an update. Then they check the hype train...
I had a small loss of HypeOntrol! We've lost speed since page 300! Down to Hypergridic Factor 3.1! Checking the ol' graphy paper, our maximum speed so far was Hyperplaidic Factor 3.99975. Hype!!!
It's happening!
[https://youtu.be/1Df-LvrRcEo](https://youtu.be/1Df-LvrRcEo)
Well it's been loads of fun hyping with you guys, but I think I'm go to be HYPING TO DA MAX!!!!!!
65 page get

> 
> No...please...have mercy ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
> I will be driving home (~3 hour trip) and if KSP gets released on my way there...well...I think speeding ticket will be imminent ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Don't even stop for the cops! Just tell them that 1.0 came out and you'll be racing them home! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I wonder if they're going to do anything about the SteamDB.

What the servers are hearing: 

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/nZZ504TGDpE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
Faster guys! We need to go faster!
